title: Test
text:
This tests the formatting. We can also do math, inline: \(E=mc^2\); or not: \[ \sin^2(x)+\cos^2(x)=1. \]
— Cory McCartan, 2019 cohort

title: Stuff I Wish I'd Known Earlier in My Ph.D.
text:
There’s a lot more learning that goes on in a Ph.D. than just the formal coursework. Here you’ll find some of the accumulated wisdom of current and past Ph.D. students. Some pages will require a login to view.
